verses.verse: Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> remember <S%H2142><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> and all his affliction, <S%H6031><s%>
how he swore <S%H7650><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and vowed <S%H5087><s%> to the Mighty <S%H46><s%> One of Jacob: <S%H3290><s%>
"Surely I will not come <S%H935><s%> into the structure <S%H168><s%> of my house, <S%H1004><s%> nor go up <S%H5927><s%> into my bed; <S%H6210><s%>
I will not give <S%H5414><s%> sleep <S%H8153><s%> to my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> or slumber <S%H8572><s%> to my eyelids; <S%H6079><s%>
until I find out <S%H4672><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> for Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> a dwelling <S%H4908><s%> for the Mighty <S%H46><s%> One of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>"
Behold, <S%H8085><s%> we heard of it in Ephrathah. <S%H672><s%> We found <S%H4672><s%> it in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Jaar: <S%H3293><s%>
"We will go <S%H935><s%> into his dwelling <S%H4908><s%> place. <S%H7812><s%> We will worship at his footstool. <S%H1916><s%>
Arise, <S%H6965><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> into your resting <S%H4496><s%> place; <S%H727><s%> you, and the ark of your strength. <S%H5797><s%>
Let your priest <S%H3548><s%> be clothed <S%H3847><s%> with righteousness. <S%H6664><s%> Let your saints <S%H2623><s%> shout for joy! <S%H7442><s%>"
For your servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>'s sake, <S%H7725><s%> don't turn away the face <S%H6440><s%> of your anointed one. <S%H4899><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has sworn <S%H7650><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> in truth. <S%H571><s%> He will not turn <S%H7725><s%> from it: <S%H7896><s%> "I will set the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your body <S%H990><s%> on your throne. <S%H3678><s%>

If your children <S%H1121><s%> will keep <S%H8104><s%> my covenant, <S%H1285><s%> my testimony <S%H5713><s%> that <S%H2090><s%> I will teach <S%H3925><s%> them, <S%H1121><s%> their children also will sit <S%H3427><s%> on your throne <S%H3678><s%> forevermore. <S%H5703><s%>"
For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%> Zion. <S%H6726><s%> He has desired <S%H183><s%> it for his habitation. <S%H4186><s%>
"This is my resting <S%H4496><s%> place forever. <S%H5703><s%> Here I will live, <S%H3427><s%> for I have desired it. <S%H183><s%>
I will abundantly <S%H1288><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> her provision. <S%H6718><s%> I will satisfy <S%H7646><s%> her poor <S%H34><s%> with bread. <S%H3899><s%>
Her priests <S%H3548><s%> I will also clothe <S%H3847><s%> with salvation. <S%H3468><s%> Her saints <S%H2623><s%> will shout aloud <S%H7442><s%> for joy. <S%H7444><s%>
There I will make <S%H6779><s%> the horn <S%H7161><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> to bud. <S%H6779><s%> I have ordained <S%H6186><s%> a lamp <S%H5216><s%> for my anointed. <S%H4899><s%>
I will clothe <S%H3847><s%> his enemies <S%H341><s%> with shame, <S%H1322><s%> but on himself, <S%H5145><s%> his crown will be resplendent. <S%H6692><s%>"
